item.title: Gitlab runner configure ceph s3
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: When building Npm for front-end projects, it often takes a long time to pull the front-end library. In addition, reuse between different jobs is also a problem. Whether it is artifacts or cache, we need to persist the reused files. Here we take cache as an example Note: The Gitlab runner here is deployed to the k8s cluster using the helm chart method, and the runner deployment is ignored; the
